message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.IR. 

This paper deals with relation extraction, which is a subfield of natural language processing (NLP). The use of reinforcement learning (RL) also suggests a focus on machine learning and artificial intelligence (AI). Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) are the most likely sub-categories. The hierarchical RL framework and the use of policies also suggest a focus on machine learning and decision-making, which could fall under cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). Finally, the use of distant supervision for dataset collection suggests a focus on information retrieval (IR), which could fall under cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
